definitions.definition: An emission of a rapid stream of bubbles .
examples: I poured a cola and waited for the fizz to settle down before topping off the glass.

definitions.definition: The sound of such an emission.
examples: Evan sat back in the hot tub and listened to the relaxing fizz and pops produced by the eruption of bubbles.
Nathan ordered an orange fizz from the soda jerk at the counter.

main_definition: An emission of a rapid stream of bubbles .
secondary_definitions: The sound of such an emission.
